name: GhostbustersFranchise84
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ghostbusters
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Featuring the voice talents of Dan Aykroyd and Ernie Hudson, Ghostbusters: Franchise 84 is a new interactive audio adventure game for all ages.

Are you troubled by strange noises in the middle of the night? Do you experience feelings of dread in your basement or attic? Have you or any of your family seen a specter or a ghost? If the answer is yes, then don’t wait another minute. 

WHO YOU GONNA CALL? Say, “Alexa, open Ghostbusters!”

** Make sure ‘Kid Skill Purchasing’ is enabled in your Alexa app to play the full game** 

Lead a brand-new team of paranormal investigators, work alongside the original Ghostbusters, and learn from the masters how to trap all sorts of ghosts, goblins, and ghouls.

Ghostbusters: Franchise 84 is playable over five story missions and also includes multiple side missions. The first mission is available for all users to play, with the option to purchase the full Season One: Haunted Echoes if Kid Skill Purchasing is enabled. *

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ghostbusters: Franchise 84 skill is suitable for kids and fans and will require verified parental consent if not granted earlier for another kids' skill.

* Voice purchasing is not required for FreeTime Unlimited subscribers. For others, voice purchase settings are available in your Alexa App.

ADDITIONAL NOTE: Disabling the skill will erase all previous player data on the game.

TM & © 2022 COLUMBIA PICTURES INDUSTRIES, INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

Tobin's Spirit Guide: Official Ghostbusters Edition published by Insight Editions, available wherever books are sold.
priv:
